view

Interface GuiComponentFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuiComponentFactoryImpl

    public interface GuiComponentFactory
    An abstract factory for creating GUI components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.swing.JDialog createActionDialog(javax.swing.JFrame owner, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message, java.awt.event.ActionListener actionListener)
      Creates a new dialog with a title, a message and an "OK" button which, when pressed, it closes the dialog.
      javax.swing.JButton createButton(java.lang.String text)
      Creates a button with the given text.
      javax.swing.JButton createButton(java.lang.String text, javax.swing.ImageIcon icon)
      Creates a button with the given text and icon.
      javax.swing.JButton createButton(java.lang.String text, javax.swing.ImageIcon icon, java.awt.event.ActionListener actionListener)
      Creates a button with the given text, the icon and the given action listener.
      javax.swing.JButton createButton(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String iconPath, java.awt.event.ActionListener actionListener)
      Creates a button with the given text, the icon (to be loaded from the file-system with the given icon path) and the given action listener.
      javax.swing.border.Border createEmptyPaddingBorder(int defaultPadding)
      Creates a new empty padding border of the given size.

      Creates a file chooser with the given file description and file extension.

      Creates a new empty frame with the given height-to-screen-size ratio and width-to-height ratio.

      Creates a new ImageIcon loading the icon from the given path.
      javax.swing.JLabel createLabel(java.lang.String text)
      Creates a new label with the given text.

      Creates a new dialog with a title, a message and an "OK" button which, when pressed, it closes the dialog.

      Creates a resized version of a given ImageIcon object, with the given width and height.

    • Method Detail

      • createFrame

        javax.swing.JFrame createFrame(java.lang.String title,
                               double heightToScreenSizeRatio,
                               double widthToHeightRatio)
        Creates a new empty frame with the given height-to-screen-size ratio and width-to-height ratio. This is made to make the frame size relative to the machine-specific screen size.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the frame
        heightToScreenSizeRatio - the height to screen size ratio
        widthToHeightRatio - the width to height ratio
        Returns:
        the j frame

      • createNotifyDialog

        javax.swing.JDialog createNotifyDialog(javax.swing.JFrame owner,
                                       java.lang.String title,
                                       java.lang.String message)
        Creates a new dialog with a title, a message and an "OK" button which, when pressed, it closes the dialog.
        Parameters:
        owner - the frame owner of the dialog
        title - the title of the dialog
        message - the message of the dialog
        Returns:
        the j dialog

      • createActionDialog

        javax.swing.JDialog createActionDialog(javax.swing.JFrame owner,
                                       java.lang.String title,
                                       java.lang.String message,
                                       java.awt.event.ActionListener actionListener)
        Creates a new dialog with a title, a message and an "OK" button which, when pressed, it closes the dialog. Also, it attaches to the button the given action listener.
        Parameters:
        owner - the frame owner of the dialog
        title - the title of the dialog
        message - the message of the dialog
        actionListener - the action listener to be attached to the "ok" button
        Returns:
        the j dialog
